document.full_text: twelve people were killed and 80 wounded in violent protests wednesday against the killing of two men and two women, accused of being insurgents, in a night-time raid by foreign troops in north afghanistan, afghan officials said.
document.title: twelve dead in protests after two women killed in afghan raid
lines_and_colors: twelve people were killed and 80 wounded in violent protests wednesday against the killing of two men and two women, accused of being insurgents, in a night-time raid by foreign troops in north afghanistan, afghan officials said.
